verbose_text: In the present study, PEG-Ex4 increased VEGF level in both failing heart induced by MI and cultured HUVECs while VEGF inhibition abolished the survival and functional benefit of PEG-Ex4 treatment and increase of tube formation, confirming that PEG-Ex4 increases VEGF production by endothelial cells and this effect plays a key role in mediating the cardioprotection of PEG-Ex4.
